name: Vegan Pancakes
instructions: Mix all ingredients and cook on a skillet.

name: Gluten-Free Salad
instructions: Chop ingredients and mix in a bowl.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: Cook spaghetti. Brown beef with onion and garlic. Add tomato sauce and simmer. Combine with spaghetti.

name: Quinoa Salad
instructions: Cook quinoa. Mix with black beans, corn, diced bell pepper, cilantro, and lime juice.

name: Chicken Stir Fry
instructions: Cook chicken in a pan. Add vegetables, garlic, and ginger. Stir in soy sauce and cook until vegetables are tender.

name: Vegetarian Chili
instructions: Cook onion and bell pepper. Add beans, tomato sauce, and spices. Simmer for 20 minutes.

name: Tofu Stir Fry
instructions: Cook tofu in a pan. Add vegetables, garlic, and ginger. Stir in soy sauce and cook until vegetables are tender.

name: Mango Salsa
instructions: Dice mango and red onion. Mix with chopped cilantro, lime juice, and diced jalapeno.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
instructions: Cook chicken and slice. Toss with lettuce, parmesan, croutons, and dressing.
